comments.author: Meg Doyle

comments.text:
+Meg Doyle All I am saying is that I do not like when Benedict Cumberbatch 
is bitched about when he calls his colleagues "coloured" and all that 
racial touchiness but not the other way around. Yes, (I am not sure if this 
is what we can call this group of people) the black girls have got a body 
shape and some kind of fluidity of movement, generally... But not 
exclusively. And these girls are actresses. Saw Kate Hudson dancing? I 
think she can shake it. But this is meant to be cute and awkws.
comments.author: Dominique

comments.text:
+Dominique Don't hate on the stereotype.  Yes.  I know it's not a nice 
thing to say... but look at them dance.  I mean c'mon.  Stereotypes are 
real.  I'm not perpetuating it here -- merely just expressing it. Okay, 
maybe I'm perpetuating a bit, but no more than their attempt at dancing 
here.
comments.author: Meg Doyle

comments.author: Al M

comments.text:
Rachel clearly had feelings for Dex before Darcey and him were an item. 
Rachel thot that Dex had alrdy knew about her having a crush on him back in 
law school when she told him while they were having a couple of beers after 
her 30th. That made Dex think twice about his relationship with Darcey 
hence why he kissed Rachel in the taxi. That just goes to show that Dex 
still had feelings for Rachel even tho he was with Darcey. Both Dex and 
Rachel were indenial of their feelings - if they had been honest in the 
beginning then the whole affair wouldnt have happened. Basically Darcey is 
a bitch and Rachel can always find another best friend....in the end Dex 
and Rachel ended up together, at least it their friendship wasnt sacrificed 
for nothing lol﻿
